name: القمر
ayaTranslation: iqtarabati ssaa'atu wainsyaqqa lqamaru
wa-in yaraw aayatan yu'ridhuu wayaquuluu sihrun mustamirrun
wakadzdzabuu waittaba'uu ahwaa-ahum wakullu amrin mustaqirrun
walaqad jaa-ahum mina l-anbaa-i maa fiihi muzdajarun
hikmatun baalighatun famaa tughnii nnudzuru
fatawalla 'anhum yawma yad'u ddaa'i ilaa syay-in nukurin
khusysya'an abshaaruhum yakhrujuuna mina l-ajdaatsi ka-annahum jaraadun muntasyirun
muhthi'iina ilaa ddaa'i yaquulu lkaafiruuna haadzaa yawmun 'asirun
kadzdzabat qablahum qawmu nuuhin fakadzdzabuu 'abdanaa waqaaluu majnuunun waizdujir
fada'aa rabbahu annii maghluubun faintashir
fafatahnaa abwaaba ssamaa-i bimaa-in munhamirin
wafajjarnaa l-ardha 'uyuunan failtaqaa lmaau 'alaa amrin qad qudir
wahamalnaahu 'alaa dzaati lwaahin wadusurin
tajrii bi-a'yuninaa jazaa-an liman kaana kufir
walaqad taraknaahaa aayatan fahal min muddakirin
fakayfa kaana 'adzaabii wanudzuri
walaqad yassarnaa lqur-aana lildzdzikri fahal min muddakirin
kadzdzabat 'aadun fakayfa kaana 'adzaabii wanudzuri
innaa arsalnaa 'alayhim riihan sharsharan fii yawmi nahsin mustamirrin
tanzi'u nnaasa ka-annahum a'jaazu nakhlin munqa'irin
fakayfa kaana 'adzaabii wanudzuri
walaqad yassarnaa lqur-aana lildzdzikri fahal min muddakirin
kadzdzabat tsamuudu binnudzuri
faqaaluu abasyaran minnaa waahidan nattabi'uhu innaa idzan lafii dhalaalin wasu'urin
aulqiya dzdzikru 'alayhi min bayninaa bal huwa kadzdzaabun asyirun
saya'lamuuna ghadan mani lkadzdzaabu l-asyiru
innaa mursiluu nnaaqati fitnatan lahum fairtaqibhum waisthabir
wanabbi/hum anna lmaa-a qismatun baynahum kullu syirbin muhtadharun
fanaadaw shaahibahum fata'aataa fa'aqar
fakayfa kaana 'adzaabii wanudzuri
innaa arsalnaa 'alayhim shayhatan waahidatan fakaanuu kahasyiimi lmuhtazhiri
walaqad yassarnaa lqur-aana lildzdzikri fahal min muddakirin
kadzdzabat qawmu luuthin binnudzuri
innaa arsalnaa 'alayhim hasiban illaa aala luuthin najjaynaahum bisaharin
ni'matan min 'indinaa kadzaalika najzii man syakar
walaqad andzarahum bathsyatanaa fatamaaraw binnudzuri
walaqad raawaduuhu 'an dhayfihi fathamasnaa a'yunahum fadzuuquu 'adzaabii wanudzuri
walaqad shabbahahum bukratan 'adzaabun mustaqirrun
fadzuuquu 'adzaabii wanudzuri
walaqad yassarnaa lqur-aana lildzdzikri fahal min muddakirin
walaqad jaa-a aala fir'awna nnudzuru
kadzdzabuu bi-aayaatinaa kullihaa fa-akhadznaahum akhdza 'aziizin muqtadirin
akuffaarukum khayrun min ulaa-ikum am lakum baraa-atun fii zzuburi
am yaquuluuna nahnu jamii'un muntashirun
sayuhzamu ljam'u wayuwalluuna ddubur
bali ssaa'atu maw'iduhum wassaa'atu adhaa wa-amarru
inna lmujrimiina fii dhalaalin wasu'urin
yawma yushabuuna fii nnaari 'alaa wujuuhihim dzuuquu massa saqar
innaa kulla syay-in khalaqnaahu biqadarin
wamaa amrunaa illaa waahidatun kalamhin bilbashari
walaqad ahlaknaa asyyaa'akum fahal min muddakirin
wakullu syay-in fa'aluuhu fii zzuburi
wakullu shaghiirin wakabiirin mustatharun
inna lmuttaqiina fii jannaatin wanaharin
fii maq'adi shidqin 'inda maliikin muqtadirin
